snippet.title: Tachyon Dreams Anthology Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Time itself is breaking up, and Dodger, the dishwashing dude onboard Penrose Space Station, is the unlikely fixer. Join the chaos in this 80s-style comedy, sci-fi text-parser adventure game as Dodger tackles a cosmic crisis like no other! Experience all three episodes seamlessly combined into one complete adventure, now with NEW EXTRA CONTENT!

Wishlist on Steam and try out the demo:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2731920/Tachyon_Dreams_Anthology/

Coming out in 2024!

#indiegame #indiedev #indiegamedev #retrogames #retro #retrogaming #adventuregame #gamedev #comedy #scifi
